name: Shopping Taxi Simulator
description:
The ultimate taxi driving experience in this shopping mall cart game is a driving adventure in it self. Shopping Taxi Simulator gives the customers a better shopping experience as they don't have to walk all the way across in the big mall. The luxury taxi runs in the shopping centre and you have to park the taxi once your shift is over. Amazing Taxi Driving, Parking and pick and drop of customers are all part of this amazing taxi driver simulator. Car simulator games are always fun but driving a taxi in a mall has different challenges. Take the customers to their desired locations in the huge mall in this taxi transport game. Park the taxi car where the customers want to get off at the supermarket.

Features:
• Be Ready for riding favorite mall taxi cart
• Take the customers towards the mall’s shops
• Help people in finding the shops
• Awesome shopping floors of the huge shopping 3d environment
• Good chance to show your driving skills
• Attractive sounds effects and smooth controls
